html:
28 January, Sunday
  • Clock newsLukashenko: Slavian unity will be restored
  • News
  • Exclusive
  • News
    • Find it.
    • President Putin
    • Ukraine
    • Israel
    • Russia and the United States
    • Army and arms
    • Oil and rubles
    • Games
    • Three U.S. soldiers died in Jordan, dozens injured
    • NYT: Israel was a major source of arms for Hamas
    • UPU complained of the West ' s ban on hitting " in the territory of Russia "
    • Details of arms transfers from Greece to Ukraine were disclosed
    • In Hungary, claims were filed in Zakarpatije following the defeat of Ukraine

    World

    News
    19:40Three American military personnel were killed in an attack on the US base in Jordan

    As a result of the drone attack on the United States base in northern Jordan, three American military personnel were killed and a CNN television channel referred to officials.

    17:07New York Times: Israel was a major source of arms for Hamas

    Israel was a major source of arms and ammunition for the Hamas Palestinian movement, as the faction ' s members received explosives mainly from unexploded Israeli shells, reported New York Times, citing Western and Israeli officials.

    16:37Sholz: Germany alone cannot bear such a heavy burden of assistance to Ukraine

    The EU countries should provide more assistance to Ukraine, as Germany alone is unable to carry so much burden, considers the Chancellor of the FWG Olaf Scholz.

    15:40The Iranian Navy seized a tanker with smuggled fuel.

    The Iranian Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRC, elite parts of Iran ' s NZ) was detained in the Persian Gulf by a tanker carrying smuggled fuel by the media.

    15:37Farion called Lions a " country of Russian-speaking diversates "

    The former deputy of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine, Irina Farion, overshadowed a large number of Russian-speaking Lvov residents.

    15:20In German Stuttgarte, they evacuated the station.

    At the station in the German city of Stuttgart, the evacuation was due to “some suspicious people”, the movement of trains was temporarily stopped and the media reported.

    14:39Head of the United States Bank JPMorgan: The United States is moving to collapse due to the growth of the debt.

    Owing to the growth of the United States dollar, the country " moving to the cliff " , considers the United States bank CEO JPMorgan Chase James Daymon, his words are Fox News.

    13:48The 6.5 earthquake occurred in Brazil

    An earthquake of 6.5 is recorded in Brazil, reported by the U.S. Geological Service.

    12:58The politicologist assessed the prospects of the German support party for Erdogan.

    The German legal and police system will find ways to neutralize the German prototype DAVA, a politicologist, Fedor Lukjanov.

    05:45The Israeli army arrested five Palestinians in the West Bank of the Jordan River

    At least five Palestinians were arrested by the Israeli military during raids in the West Bank of the Jordan River, during which the military used firearms and tear-gassings against protesting Palestinian youth.

    05:23The Commander of the Navy of Ukraine asked Britain to have written-off ships.

    The Commander of the Naval Force of Ukraine, Alexei Neigpapa, said that Ukraine needed warships, so the Navy would welcome the two British ships that were going to write off because of the shortage of sailors.

    05:07The DPRK launched several cruise missiles towards the Japan Sea

    The Committee of Chiefs of Staff of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Korea (South Korea) announced the launch of several cruise missiles from the eastern coast of the DPRK towards the Japan Sea.

    04:50Joe Byden's speech in South Carolina was interrupted several times.

    U.S. President Joe Byden, during his election with supporters in South Carolina State, was faced with attempts to cut him out of the crowd.

    04:06Israel began a storm of cities in the West Bank of the Jordan River

    The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) stormed the West Bank towns of the Jordan River and fought violently with the Palestinian resistance.

    03:51The United States, Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia decided to change the leader of Palestine

    United States diplomas, Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia are discussing the transfer of power within the Palestinian Authority from the current President, Mahmoud Abbas, to a new leader, among whom several candidates are being considered.

    03:15An earthquake of 4.8 occurred in the Tokyo Gulf

    The earthquake of 4.8 was recorded in the morning in the Gulf of Tokyo and the national meteorological office of Japan reported.

    02:45Trump called Americans a nation from the way.

    Former President Donald Trump accused the current leader of the country, Joe Byden, that the United States was “destructive”, as well as calling Americans a nation that had fallen from a path that would not “to continue this horror”.

    02:28Tramp predicament in the United States due to the influx of irregular migrants

    Former President Donald Trump stated that, due to the record influx of illegal migrants and the situation on the southern border, there could be major terrorist attacks.

    00:51The Ukrainian Ministry of Defence was accused of attempting to steal almost $40 million.

    The Security Service of Ukraine has charged a member of the Ministry of Defence and a number of suspects in an attempt to steal 1.5 billion mryvn (almost $40 million) in the purchase of mortar shells.

    00:29Antalya had an emergency flight because of screaming in the luggage compartment.

    A passenger aircraft flying from Istanbul Riyadh landed at the airport of the Turkish city of Antalya.

    The Kazakh nationalists follow the Greenland dream of Russian lands

    The Green Order on " Historically Inhabited by Ukrainians in Russia ' s territories " found a positive response in the Kazakh nationalist environment. They questioned whether Kazakhstan would be able to issue the same decree in the future on previously lost " prosperous land " . Which land can be spoken, who holds such views in the Republic and how popular are they?

    The West found a response to the original " counter-tracks " of Ukraine

    The United States is working on a new strategy to support Ukraine for 10 years. The change in tactics is to strengthen military force and the economy, to reject the return of lost territories and to reflect Russia ' s offensive. The U.S. also counts on Ukraine ' s drone strikes and sabotage. The experts say that tactics change after the original " counter-track " of the VSO is legal. But Russia, aware of the enemy's mind, has to adjust the course and purpose of the PTS.

    Kim Jong-yun made North Korea more dangerous.

    United States officials and diplomats predict the possible outbreak of hostilities between North and South Korea in the coming months. The leader of the DPRK, Kim Jong-yun, has indeed done almost unthinkable and has given Americans the idea that they are playing with fire and that a new war on the Korean peninsula is not just a threat.

    Hungary and Slovakia threatened punishment from America

    The United States Ambassador to Hungary stated that America has " pressure markets " for Budapest. In parallel, anti-government rallies were held in Slovakia. The demonstrators opposed the Prime Minister of Robert Ficio. This is happening against the background of the convergence of the two Eastern European States in the unwillingness to finance the conflict in Ukraine. Can they resist the White House pressure?

    Views
    Gléb Prostakov
    The West fears the food monopoly of Russia

    Ukraine ' s black lands are valuable, which is now in the country, with the destruction of a large part of the industry. But the ability to complete the uptake of Ukrainian land by foreign capital has greatly complicated the risks from the ongoing Russia's special operations.

    12 comments
    Gevorg Mirzayan
    Kazakh nationalism would sooner or later lead to a conflict with Moscow

    Practically any nationalism on the Russian periphery would be anti-Russian. Its purpose is to separate Russia from its cultural space from centuries of history together with us.

    62 commentary
    Igor Maltese
    Why would Europe suggest war with Russia

    Yesterday, European leaders told their citizens that Russia was about to surrender to the Greens near Mariupola. Today, they speak of Russia ' s compulsory attack on Europe immediately after Putin smashes the Earth. Are they really crazy in there?

    12 comments
    Timofei Bordachev
    Can the Euros fall apart?

    European policies that claim power in the future are conceived of how they will build relations with the United States, China or Russia against the backdrop of a rapidly changing world order.

    11 comments
    Vadim Truhačev
    Belgium is the best target for hard action. Russian Federation

    Belgium has actively pursued anti-Russian declarations and actions. It was she who proposed the removal of the 280 billion euros belonging to Russia. But that country was very vulnerable, and Russia could respond to many difficulties for the Belgians, whose burial would cause them themselves, and the European Union as a whole would ease the attention of Ukraine and us.

    20 comments
    Yuri Mavasev
    Husitas united the Middle East v. West

    Yemen ' s Husitis have become a line of fracture between East and West. Tens, or perhaps hundreds of thousands of volunteers from Arab countries, may wish to engulf with the West for the atrocities of the recent past in Gaza. Nobody can hold them.

    3 Comments
    26 January 2024

    Broken Czech electricity has made Latvia grateful to remember the USSR.

    The grand scandal turns out in Latvia. The management of the local railway company was forced to resign because of the marriageable electricity provided by the Czech Republic. The praiseworthy European quality has been saved where Soviet trains have been successful for decades. What happened?

    Details...
    • 57 comments
    25 January 2024

    The Supreme Court pushed Texas out of the United States.

    The struggle between the President of the United States and the Congress for money for Ukraine has received another dimension. The White House requires funds to deal with the migration crisis, and the fact that the crisis is continuing has encouraged the separatists of Texas, because what is happening is their state problem. If it becomes an independent State, it's one of the richest in the world.

    Details...
    • 34 comments
    25 January 2024

    The lessons of Afghanistan compel America to leave Iraq

    In the United States and Russia, Washington ' s plans to start negotiations with Baghdad on the withdrawal of troops from Iraq were reported. Similar allegations were made against Syria, but the Pentagon ' s information was denied. These discussions are being conducted against the backdrop of unprecedented attacks on American infrastructure in the Middle East. Does Washington decide to withdraw? What will this decision be for the whole region?

    Details...
    • 8 comments
    25 January 2024

    The French thinker will end the hegemony of the West.

    Russia defends its sovereignty by its actions in Ukraine and there is an increase in madness in the West. Western countries are oligarchy, in Russia, democracy. These Western frames were assessed by one of the leading French intellectuals. His observations look particularly interesting, how much society in Russia is more stable than American.

    Details...
    • 32 comments
    25 January 2024

    Russia ' s victory in Ukraine will be a good for the world.

    “We will receive an increase in the number of friends of Russia” — in such words, the experts describe the global implications that should be expected from Russia ' s victory in Ukraine ' s special operations. These consequences will benefit not only our country but also the world as a whole.

    Details...
    • 15 comments
    24 January 2024

    The Washington Elite has spoiled Trampe's victory.

    Donald Trump won the first Republican primers who went to New Hampshire. However, the elites of the Republican Party are not going to surrender and are preparing for a new battle. If they reach their own, Trump will lose his political freedom and seriously risk his own life.

    Details...
    • 9 comments
    24 January 2024

    Ukraine is trying to create a new plate on Dnieper.

    The U.S.U. is building a military-vehicle hab on the Hirsson and Nikolaev regions. This is the village of Snigirevka, where more fighters and military equipment are being targeted. In addition, the Ukrainian authorities seized building equipment from the local population to build bridges. What are the ultimate objectives of commanding such actions by the U.S.?

    Details...
    • 30 comments
    24 January 2024

    Europeans are becoming the main force of opposition in the EU

    Alternates for Germany and the French faction of the Patriota allowed both countries to withdraw from the EU. These statements are made against the backdrop of a sharp increase in the approval of the European skepticalism and the continuing economic downturn of the alliance. Can Berlin and Paris really leave Europe? Does Russia need to preserve this organization in the future?

    Details...
      23 January 2024

      Turkey rises against the scout of Western intelligence

      Erdogan made another demonstration anti-western gesture. This time, it is a procedure for interaction between the Western and Turkish special services. What exactly happened, why was this so offensive to the Turkish intelligence community, and personally to President Erdogan of Turkey, and how would Western intelligence relations with Turkey eventually change?

      Details...
      • 16 comments
      23 January 2024

      Green made Klićko fight for survival

      A whole series of dramatic remarks about the situation in Ukraine has recently been made by a politician who stood at the end of the 2014 coup d ' état, the Mayor of Kiev Vitalia Klićko. It was abruptly cognizant that what was happening in Ukraine was “certile and authoritarianism”. Why didn't he notice that before?

      Details...
      • 8 comments
      23 January 2024

      The Europeans, because of Ukraine, realized their own weakness

      Paris and Berlin fought because of the volume of assistance to Ukraine. Germany accused France of insufficient support for the VSO. The dispute has taken place against the backdrop of the disproportionate contribution of some EU members in support of Ukraine, repeated calls by the FWG to arm in the coming years and a lack of consensus in the United States on the financing of Kiev. What are the differences between the Europeans and the fears they hide?

      Details...
      • 6 comments
      22 January 2024

      Green decided to legitimize terrorism against Russia

      Within the framework of his regular social media stamp, President Vladimir Zelensky brought two of his initiatives to peace, a bill on multiple nationality and a decree on " Historically populated territories of the Russian Federation " . Both initiatives are comical in their own way, but significant, and the other is even dangerous.

      Details...
      • 36 comments
      22 January 2024

      Why is France afraid of Russia ' s grace

      The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of France scares the whole world: in his words, in the event of victory in Ukraine, Russia will control “30 per cent of world grain exports”. From the point of view of Paris, this leads to a series of problems. What are the problems involved and why is France itself responsible for its current difficulties with grain exports?

      Details...
      • 14 comments
      22 January 2024

      How to protect Russia ' s escaped supporters

      “For his love for Russia, he lost everything”. In this way, the experts describe the situation of a Lithuanian activist who escaped from political persecution to Russia but suddenly threatened with deportation. This case is not unique - often foreign compatriots who choose to move to Russia face different kinds of difficulties. What are we talking about and how to help these people?

      Details...
      • 24 comments
      21 January 2024

      Paris came up with a trick to deny the death of French mercenaries in Ukraine.

      France categorically denies that French mercenaries are fighting on the side of the U.S. This was the official response of Paris to the Russian Ministry of Defence ' s statements on destruction in Harkova by dozens of French citizens. In this denial, however, there is a certain trick and trick associated with who the French consider to be mercenaries.

      Details...
      • 38 comments
      20 January 2024

      Why would Kyiv have words about " successful counter-attacks "

      Ukraine ' s counter-aggression, which has been recognized not only in the West and in Russia, but also in Kiev itself, was allegedly successful. This was stated by the head of the office of President Green Andrei Hermak. In the expert environment, it is certain that “successful” in Kiev refer to terrorist attacks against civilian objects and civilians in Russia, including in Belgorod and Donetsk. At the same time, the fairy tales of Hermaca are part of a hybrid war against Russia.

      Details...
      • 18 comments
      Next page

      Circular 2005-2024 GS, Business Gazette Watch. Write to us.information@vz.ru

      Drafting policy

      How the gas goes through Ukraine without a contract.

      Slovakia began to agree with Ukraine to continue to receive Russian gas after the end of the transit contract with Gazprom this year. Completion is not a sentence. Transit can be continued without him. How is that possible and what can prevent?Details

      • Novak stated that Russia was prepared to supply gas to Europe by various routes.
      • Rosneft paid 4 trillion tax roubles for 2023
      • Peskov rejected allegations of " obstruction " by Russia of the dominance of the United States in the financial system
      Move to section

      The Hamma towards Trumpa will become the Green song

      " First think and then speak. " This was the response of the President of Ukraine, Vladimir Zelen Donaldu Trampe, to his proposals for a settlement of the conflict. Obviously Zelensky said that without thinking about his own fate.Details

      • Lukashenko: Slavian unity will be restored
      • Rar: The Turkish Party has a great future in Germany
      • Putin stated that relations with Belarus had been vigorously developed.
      Move to section

      Two key strikes helped remove the Leningrad blockade.

      27 January is one of the most important dates in Russia ' s history. On this day, 80 years ago, the Red Army completely lifted Leningrad from the German-Fashist blockade. Two strikes were ultimately key to the success of this operation: one was extremely risky and the other was almost random. But both of them were successful.Details

      • The Prosecutor ' s Office took control of the inspection of the fire at Theatre of the Satira in Moscow.
      • The aborted play in Theatre was visited by Theatre Mossovet.
      • Expert: The opening of the winter complex in Antarctica is moving global science forward
      Move to section

      The West found a response to the original " counter-tracks " of Ukraine

      The United States is working on a new strategy to support Ukraine for 10 years. The change in tactics is to strengthen military force and the economy, to reject the return of lost territories and to reflect Russia ' s offensive. The U.S. also counts on Ukraine ' s drone strikes and sabotage. The experts say that tactics change after the original " counter-track " of the VSO is legal. But Russia, aware of the enemy's mind, has to adjust the course and purpose of the PTS.Details

      • Three American military personnel were killed in an attack on the US base in Jordan
      • New York Times: Israel was a major source of arms for Hamas
      • Sholz: Germany alone cannot bear such a heavy burden of assistance to Ukraine
      Move to section

      Attack by Ukraine on Belgorod was directly involved in the West

      Ukraine has committed a new act of terror against civilians, and Belgorod has been subjected to massive bombardment of cluster munitions. Fifteen people were killed, including children. In Washington, D.C. stated that they were not encouraging such attacks, but the experts pointed out that it was the United States that was directly responsible. And not just them.Details

      • In Turkey, a train with tourists ran into a baton.
      • The wall of the house collapsed in Rostov-na-Donu
      • In Kirov, after sparring, an 18-year-old athlete died.
      Move to section
      • Denis Mirolovov
        WEFA is looking for a way to get Russian football back to Europe.

        Europe and its exits can be treated differently. But one cannot be denied: without competitive international competition, Russian football will continue to stagnate.

        14 comments
      • Gléb Prostakov
        The West fears the food monopoly of Russia

        Ukraine ' s black lands are valuable, which is now in the country, with the destruction of a large part of the industry. But the ability to complete the uptake of Ukrainian land by foreign capital has greatly complicated the risks from the ongoing Russia's special operations.

        12 comments
      • Gevorg Mirzayan
        Kazakh nationalism would sooner or later lead to a conflict with Moscow

        Practically any nationalism on the Russian periphery would be anti-Russian. Its purpose is to separate Russia from its cultural space from centuries of history together with us.

        62 commentary
      • Chisinau has denunciated an agreement with the CIS on cooperation in the elimination of the CC
      • The Ukrainians override the new yearly treatment of the Zelena
      • New cases have been initiated in Moscow as a result of the attack on the slave traders.
      Move to section

      • Another war: Korea v. Korea

        One of the leading U.S. newspapers The New York Times, referring to officials, has written about a possible outbreak of war between the two Koreas in a few months. Previously, the leader of the DPRK, Kim Jong-yun, has indeed taken a number of very brave and dramatic steps. But will the new Korean war really begin?

      • U.S.'s wrapped up by stitches.

        Half of the States of the United States have supported the state of Texas in confronting the federal authorities and the Supreme Court. The migration crisis on the border led to the inspiration of separatists in the south of the United States. Will Joe Byden America go down?

      • Poland closed the Russian case

        The Ministry of Defence of Poland has accepted the final report of the investigation of the Smolenski air crash, in which the President of Lekh Kachinski died. That means that the Polish side is taking the blame, although it has recently tried to accuse Russia. What's changed?

        Move to section

        • Ms. Tatarstan - 2024 was selected in Casani

        • Farmer protests paralyze France

        • Russia celebrated the Creation

          Move to section

          • Development of the Russian transport system in 2023

            Transport, one of the fundamental branches of the Russian economy, did not just survive in 2023 but showed growth. This applies to both internal routes and those linking Russia to the outside world. The key performance indicators for Russian transport are in our picture.

          • As the popularity of Russian payment systems is growing

            The withdrawal from the Russian market of the western services providing financial services has led to the blossom of domestic payment systems (Mir banquet maps, SBP fast payment systems, and the SPF financial communications system). The explosion of their popularity is in our picture.

          • Russia ' s largest growing industries

            The Russian industry has been growing rapidly, sometimes by tens of per cent annually. Which industries are the fastest growing in our infography.

            Move to section

            • Clickco started a match against Zelensky.

              Mayor Kiev and former World Boxing Champion for the Vitali professionals It was abruptly discovered that Ukraine was moving in the wrong direction. The Kyivist gradonalist strongly criticized the President of Ukraine, Zelensky, and stated that the country was " certified and authoritarian " . The experts link what is happening with the fall of the Zelena rating and the fact that the West has begun to find him a changer.

            • Trampu set up traps all over America.

              In the 16 states of the United States, lawsuits were filed to prevent former President Donald Trampa from participating in the Republican Party ' s primer. If these lawsuits were met, Trump would not be able to participate in the election of the head of State, but the political implications could be far more severe for all the United States.

            • Byden left Green without a Christmas present.

              The visit of the President of Ukraine to Washington, with a view to achieving the United States of America ' s next cash tranche, has ended in failure. Differences within Congress continue to prevent the adoption of a multi-million-dollar programme of assistance to Ukraine and it has already been stated that it will be " practically impossible " until Christmas.
